title: Pulse Length Classification
description:
PULSE_LENGTH sets on an input pulse at IN one of the 3 outputs. The outï¿¾put SHORT is for one cycle TRUE if the input pulse is less than T_SHORT.

The output MIDDLE will TRUE for one cycle when the input pulse length is

between T_SHORT and T_LONG. The output of LONG is set when the input

pulse has exceeded T_LONG and remains to TRUE, as the input pulse is set

to TRUE.
name: PulseLengthClassifier

input.name: IN
input.description: Input pulse signal to be classified.

output.name: SHORT
output.description: TRUE for one cycle if the input pulse is less than T_SHORT.

output.name: MIDDLE
output.description: TRUE for one cycle if the input pulse length is between T_SHORT and T_LONG.

output.name: LONG
output.description: TRUE if the input pulse exceeds T_LONG.

setup.name: T_SHORT
setup.description: Maximum length for a short pulse.

setup.name: T_LONG
setup.description: Minimum length for a long pulse.
